daddiu r2, r0, 3          -> 01100100000000100000000000000011 (0x64020003)
sd r2, a(r0)              -> 11111100000000100000000000000000 (0xFC020000)
ld r2, a(r0)              -> 11011100000000100000000000000000 (0xDC020000)
daddiu r3, r0, 1          -> 01100100000000110000000000000001 (0x64030001)
daddu r1, r2, r3          -> 00000000010000110000100000101101 (0x0043082D)
sd r1, a(r0)              -> 11111100000000010000000000000000 (0xFC010000)
ld r2, a(r0)              -> 11011100000000100000000000000000 (0xDC020000)
ld r3, a(r0)              -> 11011100000000110000000000000000 (0xDC030000)
daddiu r4, r0, 1          -> 01100100000001000000000000000001 (0x64040001)
daddu r2, r3, r4          -> 00000000011001000001000000101101 (0x0064102D)
sd r2, a(r0)              -> 11111100000000100000000000000000 (0xFC020000)
ld r3, a(r0)              -> 11011100000000110000000000000000 (0xDC030000)
daddu r2, r3, r1          -> 00000000011000010001000000101101 (0x0061102D)
sd r2, a(r0)              -> 11111100000000100000000000000000 (0xFC020000)
